Summary: I saw what appeared to be rectangular objects unattached forming a triangle hovering above the Las Vegas Strip with no lights.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was standing outside my residence at 9457 Las Vegas Blvd in the middle of the street and I looked up into the night sky and saw this triangle shaped object which was much bigger than any plane, blimp, kite, it was huge and it was made up of hundreds of rectangle like objects that looked metallic and were not connected togeather at all just free floating but which togeather made a triangle shape. It was just sitting there suspended in the air and if not for the lights from the nearby casino, The South Coast Casino I probably would not even have seen it as it had no lights of its own. I watched it until it just kind of disappeared out of sight. I was not on any kind of drug, alcohol, or any thing and I consider myself to be of very sound mind. I've always said that until I see one I will not believe it and I definitely saw this and I know that it was a UFO.
trends: There have been 229 other sightings in Las Vegas
There were no other sightings in Las Vegas on or around October 18th 2008
